minisun athara athishayinma api්rayajanaka kenek bawata pathwimata obage mewani hasirim hethu wiya hakiya.kuppiyawaththa jayashekhararama wiharawasi gaurawa shastha්rawedi mawarale bhaddiya himiee ee pudgalaya sathu kusalatha, awabodhaya ha pa්ragnyawa pilibandawa anawabodhayen wiwidha wada katayuthu pawara eewa athapasu wana wita owunta chodana kara api්rayajanaka kenaku bawata pathwanawa wenuwata apage nodannakamata chodana karaganima wadath sudusuya.thawath awasthawaka injineru samagamaka sewaka surakshithathawaya pilibandawa wagakiwayuthu sambandhikarana niladhari thanathurata pi.
